0.1.name: wordpress/move-images-between-pages
0.1.description: This plugin allows you to quickly reattach images to different pages in your WordPress installation. It places a simple drop-down menu in the edit media screen that lists all of the pages in your WordPress site and allows you to reattach the given image to a new page. Note that this plugin only works for images that are attached to pages. It ignores images that are attached to posts.
